bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the International Varadero Hotel, August 20, 1951

div1.p: Hench requests brochures for the hotel.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the International Varadero Hotel, August 20, 1951
div1.opener:
August 20, 1951
Internacional Varadero Hotel
Varadero Beach
Cuba
Gentlemen:
div1.p:
Will you kindly send me folders and rates from your
hotel. Doctor and Mrs. Gray and Mrs. Hench and I are
contemplating a trip to Havana in January and are
considering a trip to Varadero for a week beginning
January 26 or 27. I would appreciate hearing from
you at earliest convenience.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH/ac
